statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM vendor_scorecard ORDER BY reliability_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE reliability_score < 70;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE performance_score > reliability_score;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY performance_score DESC, reliability_score ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, performance_score, reliability_score FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE performance_score > 80 AND reliability_score > 90 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE reliability_score < 70 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC, performance_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, reliability_score FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE performance_score BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY reliability_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score, reliability_score FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE vendor_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location, overall_score FROM vendor_scorecard;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_location, overall_score FROM vendor_scorecard ORDER BY overall_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM scorecard_ratings;
SELECT vendor_id, delivery_performance, product_quality, communication_skills FROM scorecard_ratings ORDER BY delivery_performance DESC, product_quality ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard ORDER BY overall_score DESC, vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, overall_score FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE overall_score > 8;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE vendor_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT s.vendor_id, s.delivery_performance, s.product_quality, v.vendor_name FROM scorecard_ratings s JOIN vendor_scorecard v ON s.vendor_id = v.vendor_id;

SELECT v.vendor_name, AVG(r.delivery_performance) AS avg_delivery_performance FROM vendor_scorecard v JOIN scorecard_ratings r ON v.vendor_id = r.vendor_id GROUP BY v.vendor_name HAVING AVG(r.delivery_performance) > 7;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scores;
SELECT vendor_id, score FROM vendor_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT vendor_id, reliability_score FROM vendor_scores ORDER BY reliability_score DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, contact_name, contact_email FROM vendor_contacts WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY vendor_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM vendor_scores GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING AVG(score) > 70 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_id ORDER BY num_orders DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vc.vendor_id, vc.contact_name, po.order_date FROM vendor_contacts vc JOIN purchase_orders po ON vc.vendor_id = po.vendor_id WHERE po.total_amount > 10000 ORDER BY po.order_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND quantity > 10;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1,3,5) ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, scores.score, comments FROM suppliers JOIN scores ON suppliers.supplier_id = scores.supplier_id WHERE scores.year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating > 4.0;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_quantity > 10;
SELECT review_rating, review_comment FROM reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location, AVG(vendor_rating) AS avg_rating FROM vendors GROUP BY vendor_name, vendor_location HAVING AVG(vendor_rating) > 4.0;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT p.product_name, p.product_description, v.vendor_name FROM products p JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_id = v.vendor_id WHERE v.vendor_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT v.vendor_name, SUM(s.score_value) AS total_score FROM vendors v JOIN scores s ON v.vendor_id = s.vendor_id GROUP BY v.vendor_name ORDER BY total_score DESC;
